item.title: Comic Book Lettering The Comicraft Way
item.description:
Comic Book Lettering The Comicraft Way

68 pages!
From the award-winning Comicraft studio, this full-color, step-by-step guide of comic book lettering tips and tricks is superbly illustrated with two Hip Flask strips - one by Kurt Busiek and Stuart Immonen, and the other by Jeph Loeb and Ian Churchill!
